attributes.action: Implement Sarah's Law with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need Sarah's Law to be able to protect our children, at least if we are given the choice to know the whereabouts of these monsters we can then choose wheather or not to let our children play outside.  We can obtain a list of all ASBO's which are just petty criminals, yet you are denying us the right of finding out if there are evil twisted people living near us that can do unthinkable things to our little children!  This is something that needs to change NOW.
